Activity: Log in, check emails. Confirm that the weekly plan has been accepted. If not, contact @PROD-1 and @LPRO-1 to revise the plan.
Begin working on the highest priority task identified in the approved plan. This might involve implementing a new feature, fixing a bug, or optimizing existing code.

Continue working on the primary task. If the task involves integration with other systems or components, schedule a brief meeting with the relevant developers (e.g., @CDev-1, @SDES-1) to discuss implementation details and potential issues. Subject: Integration Discussion - [Task Name]
Document any progress made, challenges encountered, and solutions implemented. Update the task tracking system with the latest status.
Review the day's work, identify any outstanding issues, and plan for the next day's activities.
